titles.title: Commemorating the Work of United Nations Peacekeepers on International Day of United Nations Peacekeeping.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1315)
Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary:
6/15/2007--Introduced.
Commemorates the International Day of United Nations Peacekeepers. Remembers the contributions of U.N. peacekeepers to providing a safer world, particularly those who have lost their lives. Welcomes the efforts of U.N. Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon to strengthen and improve U.N. peacekeeping operations and logistical support.
